    org.apache.ignite

    • Uses of DataRegionMetrics in org.apache.ignite

      Methods in org.apache.ignite that return DataRegionMetrics 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      @Nullable DataRegionMetrics Ignite.dataRegionMetrics​(String memPlcName)
      Returns the latest DataRegionMetrics snapshot for the memory region of the given name.
      @Nullable DataRegionMetrics IgniteSpringBean.dataRegionMetrics​(String memPlcName)
      Returns the latest DataRegionMetrics snapshot for the memory region of the given name.
      Methods in org.apache.ignite that return types with arguments of type DataRegionMetrics 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Collection<DataRegionMetrics> Ignite.dataRegionMetrics()
      Deprecated.
      Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=io.dataregion.
      Collection<DataRegionMetrics> IgniteSpringBean.dataRegionMetrics()
      Returns a collection of DataRegionMetrics that reflects page memory usage on this Apache Ignite node instance.
